experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.responsibilities:
Develop multiple web applications, systems and
      automation tools using Coldfusion and Ruby languages. Develop and maintain
      a Rails Web Application/service that makes API calls via Soap to Sprint
      for data and order retrieval. Develop new websites and enhanced existing
      applications. Coordinate testing the roll out of automation changes. Research
      technical issues and provided recommendations. Participate in business
      requirements analysis, software evaluation and selection and application
      integration. Develop, enhanced, maintained customer facing and
      internal web applications.

experience.company: Indiana Foster Care and Adoption Association
experience.title: Director of Information Technology
experience.responsibilities:
Manage four custom Joomla websites and
      two e-commerce web stores. Provide solutions using Coldfusion, jQuery,
      AJAX, CSS and HTML. Continued support and development of a Coldfusion
      application and MS-SQL database built for the Department of Child
      Services for Indiana used to recruit families and track the youth of
      Indiana in need of adoption or foster care. Also provide network
      administration, including backups, security, end-user computer support, user accounts,
      email systems, internet telecommunications and local applications support.

experience.title: Web Application Engineer
experience.responsibilities:
State contract through Success Technologies Inc. to
       develop a secure and innovative data solution for the Department of Child
       Services of Indiana to use for the purpose of recruitment of families and
       tracking of youth progress. The application was built using Coldfusion,
       AJAX, jQuery, CSS and HTML with a MS-SQL database. This codebase
       is audited by the state each year to verify that security and programming
       standards are current.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.responsibilities: Build high quality web applications using JavaScript, Java, ColdFusion for our clients. I also evaluate and educate the development team on new techniques and technologies. High-level application design including technologies, frameworks, and coding practices.
experience.achievements: Introduced unit testing, continuous integration, source control, and development best practices to the team.  Started the Lunch and Learn program where team members teach each other new technologies and techniques. Lead development teams of up to 5 developers on profitable development projects.
